name: Apothecary (benskca)
description:
In Apothecary you harvest herbs from your garden and use them to create herbal remedies. 

The game is played entirely with the mouse.

The music used can be found here:

One Bard Band by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
